arabicText: ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ أَيْمَـٰنَهُمْ جُنَّةًۭ فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	have	taken	their	oaths	as	a	shield,	
thereby	prevented	others	from	Allah’s	
way;	indeed	they	commit	extremely	evil	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unhoñ	ne	apni	qasamoñ	ko	dhāl	thehra	
liya	to	Allah	ki	rāh	se	roka	beshak	woh	
bahut	hi	bure	kām	karte	haiñ.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ ءَامَنُوا۟ ثُمَّ كَفَرُوا۟ فَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
That	is	because	they	accepted	faith	with	their	tongues	then	disbelieved	with	their	hearts,	
therefore	their	hearts	were	sealed	-	so	now	they	do	not	understand	anything.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	is	liye	ke	woh	zubān	se	imān	lāye	
phir	dil	se	kāfir	huwe	to	unke	diloñ	par	
mohar	kardi	gayi	to	ab	woh	kuchh	nahi	samajhte.

arabicText: ۞ وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ تُعْجِبُكَ أَجْسَامُهُمْ ۖ وَإِن يَقُولُوا۟ تَسْمَعْ لِقَوْلِهِمْ ۖ كَأَنَّهُمْ خُشُبٌۭ مُّسَنَّدَةٌۭ ۖ يَحْسَبُونَ كُلَّ صَيْحَةٍ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ هُمُ ٱلْعَدُوُّ فَٱحْذَرْهُمْ ۚ قَـٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ أَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	you	see	them,	their	appearance	would	please	you;	and	when	they	speak,	you	would	listen	
carefully	to	their	speech;	like	wooden	blocks	propped	against	the	wall;	they	assume	every	cry	to	be	
against	them;	they	are	the	enemy,	so	beware	of	them;	may	Allah	slay	them!	Where	are	they	reverting!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	tu	unheiñ	dekhe	unke	jism	tujhe	bhale	m’aloom	hoñ	aur	agar	bāt	kareiñ	to	tu	unki	bāt	
ghaur	se	sune	goya	wohkadiyāñhaiñ	diwār	se	tikāyi	huyi	har	buland	āawāz	apne	hi	upar	le	jāte	
haiñ	woh	dushman	haiñ	to	unse	bachte	raho	Allah	unheiñ	māre	kahān	auñdhe	jāte	haiñ!

arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَعَالَوْا۟ يَسْتَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ لَوَّوْا۟ رُءُوسَهُمْ وَرَأَيْتَهُمْ يَصُدُّونَ وَهُم مُّسْتَكْبِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	it	is	said	to	them,	“Come!	Allah’s	
Noble	Messenger	may	seek	forgiveness	for	
you”	-	they	turn	heads	away,	and	you	will	
see	them	turning	away	in	pride.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	unse	kahā	jāye	ke	āao	Rasool	ullah	
tumhāre	liye	mu’āfi	chaheiñ	to	apne	sar	
ghumāte	haiñ	aur	tum	unheiñ	dekho	ke	
ghuroor	karte	huwe	mooñh	pher	lete	haiñ.

arabicText: سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَسْتَغْفَرْتَ لَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تَسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ لَن يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	the	same	for	them,	whether	you	seek	
forgiveness	for	them	or	do	not	seek	
forgiveness	for	them;	Allah	will	never	
forgive	them;	indeed	Allah	does	not	guide	
the	sinning	people.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Un	par	ek	sa	hai	tum	unki	mu’āfi	chāho	ya	
na	chāho	Allah	unheiñ	hargiz	na	bakhshe	ga	
beshak	Allah	fāsiqoñ	ko	rāh	nahi	deta.

arabicText: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ لَا تُنفِقُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَنْ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ حَتَّىٰ يَنفَضُّوا۟ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ خَزَآئِنُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	they	who	say,	“Do	not	spend	upon	
those	who	are	with	Allah’s	Noble	
Messenger	until	they	get	distraught”;	
whereas	to	Allah	only	belong	the	treasures	
of	the	heavens	and	the	earth,	but	the	
hypocrites	do	not	have	sense.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	haiñ	jo	kehte	haiñ	un	par	kharch	na	
karo	jo	Rasool	ullah	ke	pās	haiñyahāñ	tak	
ke	pareshān	ho	jāyeñ	aur	Allah	hi	ke	liye	
haiñ	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	ke	khazāne	
magar	munāfiqoñ	ko	samajh	nahi.

arabicText: يَقُولُونَ لَئِن رَّجَعْنَآ إِلَى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ لَيُخْرِجَنَّ ٱلْأَعَزُّ مِنْهَا ٱلْأَذَلَّ ۚ وَلِلَّهِ ٱلْعِزَّةُ وَلِرَسُولِهِۦ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	say,	“If	we	return	to	Medinah,	then	
indeed	the	honourable	group	will	soon	
expel	the	lowly	one”;	whereas	all	honour	
belongs	to	Allah	and	to	His	Noble	
Messenger	and	to	the	Muslims,	but	the	
hypocrites	do	not	know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kehte	haiñ	hum	Madina	phir	kar	gaye	to	
munāfiqon	zaroor	jo	badi	‘izzat	wāla	hai	
woh	us	meiñ	se	nikāl	dega	usey	jo	nihāyat	
zillat	wāla	hai	aur	‘izzat	to	Allah	aur	uske	
Rasool	aur	Musalmanoñ	hi	ke	liye	hai	
magar	munāfiqoñ	khabar	nahi.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تُلْهِكُمْ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ عَن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	May	not	your	wealth	
or	your	children	cause	you	to	neglect	the	
remembrance	of	Allah;	and	whoever	does	
this	–	so	it	is	they	who	are	in	a	loss.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Tumhāre	māl	na	tumhāri	aulād	koi	cheez	tumheiñ	Allah	ke	zikr	se	ghāfil	na	kare	
aur	jo	aisa	kare	to	wohi	log	nuqsān	meiñ	haiñ.

arabicText: وَأَنفِقُوا۟ مِن مَّا رَزَقْنَـٰكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِىَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ فَيَقُولَ رَبِّ لَوْلَآ أَخَّرْتَنِىٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ قَرِيبٍۢ فَأَصَّدَّقَ وَأَكُن مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	spend	from	what	We	have	provided	
you	before	death	approaches	any	one	of	
you	and	he	then	says,	“My	Lord!	Why	did	you	not	give	me	respite	for	a	little	while,	so	I	would	
have	given	charity	and	become	of	the	virtuous?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hamāre	diye	meiñ	se	kuch	hamāri	rāh	meiñ	kharch	karo	qabl	iske	ke	tum	meiñ	kisi	ko	maut	
āaye	phir	kehne	lage	aey	mere	Rab	Tu	ne	mujhe	thodi	muddat	tak	kyuñ	mohlat	na	di	ke	maiñ	
sadqa	deta	aur	nekoñ	meiñ	hota.

arabicText: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَا ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	Allah	will	never	give	respite	to	any	soul	when	its	promise	arrives;	and	Allah	is	Aware	of	
your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hargiz	Allah	kisi	jān	ko	mohlat	na	dega	jab	uska	w’ada	āa	jāye	aur	Allah	ko	tumhāre	kāmoñ	
ki	khabar	hai.
